competition_summary.competitor: California’s Natural Gas Utility Operations Natural Gas Procurement and Transportation
competition_summary.context: Competition. SDG&E faces competition to serve its customer load from distributed and local power generation growth, including solar installations. In addition, the electric industry is undergoing rapid technological change, and third-party energy storage alternatives and other technologies may increasingly compete with SDG&E’s traditional transmission and distribution infrastructure in delivering electricity to consumers. Natural Gas Utility Operations We describe SDG&E’s natural gas utility ope
